page.title: 05 PEOPLE
page.content: We took a random sample of people in our area which is centred on Exning.We found out that Exning is a village which is populated by people born in Suffolk and Cambridgeshire. Most people have lived in Exning for less than 3 years.The number of people in each house varies,but the 2-4 range is the most popular.The town which employs the most people is Newmarket with the American Air-Bases second. Most people own a car which they use to get to work.There is a small percentage that also have a second car. A high percentage of people we asked have retired and therefore some of the figures may be a little out.
